problem.title: CheckPoint: Swinging Rod
problem.script:
from __future__ import division from loncapa import *
a=lc_random(1,3,1) b=lc_random(1,3,1) c=lc_random(1,3,1) m=lc_choose(a,0.80,1.20,3.0) l=lc_choose(b,0.80,1.20,1.8)
I=7* m* l* l/48
o1= math.sqrt(24/ l*9.8/7) o2= math.sqrt(48/ l*9.8/7) v= math.sqrt(27* l*9.8/14) w=1/2*I*o1*o1
problem.p: A uniform rod of mass $m kg and length $l m is pivoted in the horizontal position as shown (black point). The rod is at rest and then released. The acceleration due to gravity is g = 9.8 m/s2.
problem.part:
Part 1. Find the rotational inertia of the rod relative to the axis passing through the pivot point (in \(kg m^2\), do not include units).
\(I =\)

Part 2. As the rod swings downward, its angular speed and angular acceleration, respectively:
increases; stays constant
decreases stays constant
increases; increases
decreases; increases
increases; decreases
decreases; decreases

Part 3. What is the angular speed of the rod as it passes through the vertical position (when end marked B is at the bottom)?(in \(rad/s\), do not include units)
\(\omega =\)

Part 4. What is the linear speed of the bottom end of the rod (marked B) when it passes the vertical position?(in \(m/s\), do not include units)
\(v=\)

Part 5. What is the rotational work done by gravity during the trip?(in \(J\), do not include units)
\(W=\)
